sources.title: Gangsters of the Frontier
sources.description: Title: Gangsters of the Frontier Summary: Tex put the Kern gang away once but they have returned with reinforcements and have take over the town of Red Rock capturing the townsmen and forcing them to work for them in the gold mines... Directed by: Elmer Clifton Actors: Production Company: Alexander-Stern Productions Release Date: 22 September 1944 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Tex put the Kern gang away once but they have returned with reinforcements and have take over the town of Red Rock capturing the townsmen and forcing them to work for them in the gold mines. Dave and Tex then organize the ranchers into the Territorial Rangers. After blowing up the mines to keep the gang from getting the gold, they are ready for the showdown between the two sides.

sources.title: Gangsters of the Frontier
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Gangsters of the Frontier
sources.description: Tex put the Kern gang away once but they have returned with reinforcements and have take over the town of Red Rock capturing the townsmen and forcing them to work for them in the gold mines.

sources.title: Gangsters of the Frontier (1944) TEX RITTER
sources.description:
Stars: Tex Ritter, Dave O'Brien and Guy Wilkerson
 Writer/Director: Elmer Clifton

 Tex put the Kern gang away once but they have returned with reinforcements and have take over the town of Red Rock capturing the townsmen and forcing them to work for them in the gold mines. Dave and Tex then organize the ranchers into the Territorial Rangers. After blowing up the mines to keep the gang from getting the gold, they are ready for the showdown between the two sides.

metadata.Plot: Tex put the Kern gang away once but they have returned with reinforcements and have take over the town of Red Rock capturing the townsmen and forcing them to work for them in the gold mines. Dave and Tex then organize the ranchers into the Territorial Rangers. After blowing up the mines to keep the gang from getting the gold, they are ready for the showdown between the two sides.
metadata.Actors: Tex Ritter, Dave O'Brien, Guy Wilkerson
